content: Reserved for announcements about Connectathon 27 Patient Request for Corrections Track as well as discussions during the Track May 17-19

Important Our Track Kickoff session has been moved to Thursday, May 13th at 2PM UTC/GMT (which is 10AM ET/9AM CT)

@Debi Willis

Does anyone need a test patient to work with that is posted on the HAPI server? I have 5 test patients created called Bob MayCorrection1 - 5 each has an encounter and has a smoking status observation. Feel free to post here to claim one of them by posting here!
Also, Requesters - let me know when you post a request to HAPI and what design you are following if you need me to emulate the server.
I would like to claim a Bob.
Will Timon you have Bob MayCorrection1 then

In a slide deck, a meeting time was announced that was in correct. Correction on time for Tuesday mid-afternoon UTC meeting. The meeting will take place at 2PM UTC (10AM ET), not 1PM UTC (9AM ET). Sorry for any confusion. Whova has the right times for the track.

Hi everyone - our Confluence Page has the presentations from May 13th (orientation) and May 17th (welcome and logistics). Both have been tweaked to have correct dates/times. https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/resumedraft.action?draftId=109546002&draftShareId=c9189a47-b439-4715-ae02-c44a570c425a&
@Debi Willis @Lisa Nelson @Natasha Kreisle @Stoyan Halkaliev @Vassil Peytchev @Jeffrey Danford @Natasha Kreisle @Cheng Liu @Ward Weistra @Lynda Hoeksema @Matt Blackmon @Timon Grob

If you need me to emulate Fulfiller make sure to let me know!
Lisa or Cheng - please save me time and tell me what the documents 2126885 and 2119751 have inside them? I can't figure out how to get the data to decode. Waiting on you
well...running into time issues. Too many fun things to do in a day..
